=========================

ID: CF4GLDN_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-01 18:12
Subject: Planned Maintenance Activity: Enabling Internet on New Firewalls
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

 

Please be advised that essential maintenance has been scheduled for the D3 infrastructure/network. Consequently, the Internet, LAN, WiFi, file servers and VPN services will be unavailable during these maintenance windows. Rest assured, users will be able to resume using services once the maintenance is complete.

 

Maintenance start time: Saturday, AUG 02, 2025, | 09:00 AM GST

Maintenance end time: Saturday, AUG 02, 2025, | 03:00 PM GST

 

We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
